iti66:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti66:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of purity.
iti66:2.3: Purity of body, speech, and mind.
iti66:2.4: These are the three kinds of purity.”
iti66:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti66:3.3: A pure person, blessed with purity,
iti66:3.4: has given up everything, they say.”
iti66:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
